reviewText: Had this in old VHS format.  Just upgraded.  This is the best re-telling of old Brer Rabbit, and the Tar Baby story.  Will bring your to tears, and laughs out loud.

Danny Glover does a really nice job of narrating this classic folktale, and the artwork is charming in its own way as well, but the thing that puts this over the top and makes it something just short of a masterpiece is the beautiful, peaceful, soothing music of Taj Mahal. I'm considering getting the soundtrack as well just to hear even more. Fantastic.
Glover's narration is OK but visuals did not hold interest of 7 and 9 year old grandkids

What a terrific DVD!  I had been collecting the audio CDs of Rabbit Ear productions totally unaware of these DVDs even existing. Now I'll have to get the other DVDs. Curses! There goes the new lawn mower.
i thought this was a movie video when really it is a narration of a series of drawings. that said, my grandchildren and i all very much enjoyed this rendition of an old oral tale.
